  • Constructor Details

    • UserFacade

      public UserFacade​(User user, UserRepository userRepository, WalletManager walletManager, ArtManager artManager)
      An umbrella/facade use-case class for a user. Used as an interface to most user use-cases for controller classes.
      Parameters:
      user - User entity the methods and use-cases will interact with.
      userRepository - a UserRepository instance
      walletManager - a WalletManager instance
      artManager - an ArtManager instance
      See Also:
      User

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Login to a new user
      Parameters:
      username - username of user
      password - provided password to login
      Returns:
      true if logged in successfully

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Logs out the user entity, and logs the logout event for the user.

    • getUsername

      public java.lang.String getUsername()
      Get the user's username at the use-case level.
      Returns:
      the user's username.

    • getIsAdmin

      public boolean getIsAdmin()
      Getter for whether the user is an admin user at the use-case level.
      Returns:
      the user entities isAdmin attribute.

    • getAllEvents

      public java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.time.LocalDateTime,​java.lang.String>> getAllEvents()
      Getter for all the events related to a user.
      Returns:
      a list of key-value pairs for each events time and type, respectively, for this user.

    • getEventsByType

      public java.util.List<java.util.Map.Entry<java.time.LocalDateTime,​java.lang.String>> getEventsByType​(java.lang.String type)
      Getter for all events of a certain type related to a user.
      Parameters:
      type - a String of the type of event
      Returns:
      a list of key-value pairs for each event's time and type, respectively, of a certain type for this user.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword​(java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Facade method for changing the user's password.
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - the user's old password, used for confirmation.
      newPassword - the user's desired new password.
      See Also:
      ChangeUser

      public AdminFacade createAdminFacade()

      creates a new User
      Parameters:
      username - the String name of the new user
      password - the String password
